attributes.action: stop the govenment spending our tax money on there expenses!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why should we have to pay for their expenses when they earn more than most people in britain, people who work harder than our mp's don't get it so why should they.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
